summary: This is a retex of Lazarus89\'s Steel Swords, all swords now have the correct blood mesh.
descriptionHtml:
Howdy Folks!
This is a simple retexture and blood decal fix of a few of [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/40660 ]Lazarus89\'s Steel Swords from this Oblivion mod [/url]

I\'ve given the swords new names as you\'ll see in the screenshots. The Champion sword now swings at normal speed and all the swords have been edited to be in the skyforge steel or glass range in terms of damage.

all swords can be crafted with steel smithing and upgraded with arcane blacksmith
Also, the swords are all one-handed. I just have the 1h weapons on back mod to show the scabbards better.

Installation - You should know the drill by now, extract to your data folder in the skyrim directory and overwrite when prompted, or simply activate in NMM.

Uninstall - Just delete the applicable files

Credits - Lazarus89 did all the hard work :D
Lancelotx999 for the Skyrim port
backstept (that\'s me) retexture and blood decal fixes
author: backstept

files.name: SSPRetex02
files.changelogHtml: minor edit to fix blood mesh

complete overhaul and expanded to all 5 swords
added unique names to the swords
balanced the stats to fall in line with skyforge steel and glass weapons
